name: HomeDepot
description: This API allows you to scrape valuable product information in real time for your e-commerce automation without the deep knowledge of web scraping.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the name of the product, use this parameter to search corresponding products

return: The information including product id, title, link, rating and price of the product in given position

example.output: The product id of product in position 1 is 304177386. The title of product in position 1 is Beige Metal Stackable Folding Chairs. The link of product in position 1 is https://www.homedepot.com/p/Beige-Metal-Stackable-Folding-Chairs-SC004X001A/304177386. The rating of product in position 1 is 4.7536. The price of product in position 1 is 172.81.
